Package com.linecorp.armeria.client.retry

Interface RetryStrategy<I extends Request,O extends Response>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the request type
    O - the response type
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @FunctionalInterface
public interface RetryStrategy<I extends Request,O extends Response>
    Determines whether a failed request should be retried.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Backoff defaultBackoff  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <I extends Request,O extends Response>
      RetryStrategy<I,O>      		 never()
      A RetryStrategy that defines a retry should not be performed.
      static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onServerErrorStatus()
      Returns the RetryStrategy that retries the request with the defaultBackoff when the response matches HttpStatusClass.SERVER_ERROR or an Exception is raised.
      static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onServerErrorStatus​(Backoff backoff)
      Returns the RetryStrategy that retries the request with the specified backoff when the response matches HttpStatusClass.SERVER_ERROR or an Exception is raised.
      static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onStatus​(BiFunction<HttpStatus,Throwable,Backoff> backoffFunction)
      Returns the RetryStrategy that decides to retry the request using the specified backoffFunction.
      CompletionStage<Backoff> shouldRetry​(I request, O response)
      Returns a CompletionStage that contains Backoff which will be used for retry.

    • Field Detail

      • defaultBackoff

        static final Backoff defaultBackoff

    • Method Detail

      • never

        static <I extends Request,O extends Response> RetryStrategy<I,O> never()
        A RetryStrategy that defines a retry should not be performed.

      • onServerErrorStatus

        static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onServerErrorStatus()
        Returns the RetryStrategy that retries the request with the defaultBackoff when the response matches HttpStatusClass.SERVER_ERROR or an Exception is raised.

      • onServerErrorStatus

        static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onServerErrorStatus​(Backoff backoff)
        Returns the RetryStrategy that retries the request with the specified backoff when the response matches HttpStatusClass.SERVER_ERROR or an Exception is raised.

      • onStatus

        static RetryStrategy<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> onStatus​(BiFunction<HttpStatus,Throwable,Backoff> backoffFunction)
        Returns the RetryStrategy that decides to retry the request using the specified backoffFunction.
        Parameters:
        backoffFunction - the BiFunction that returns the Backoff or null according to the HttpStatus and Throwable

      • shouldRetry

        CompletionStage<Backoff> shouldRetry​(I request,
                                     O response)
        Returns a CompletionStage that contains Backoff which will be used for retry. If the condition does not match, this will return null to stop retry attempt. Note that ResponseTimeoutException is not retriable for the whole retry, but each attempt.
        See Also:
        RetryingClientBuilder.responseTimeoutMillisForEachAttempt(long), Per-attempt timeout
